Hello Everybody,
 I am suffering from acne. As I have oily face so this problem is not new for me. I have consulted many doctors but nothing affected me. One day my friend told me regarding Dalacin T solution. I want to know that can I use this medicine while I am pregnant or during breastfeeding? As I am expecting child by the end of this month I want to be on the safe side. I will not use this drug if it has any effect on the child.

post_info.post_title: Use of Delacin T in Pregnancy

Hello Jemmy,
 I have read your question and will be obliged to answer regarding use of Dalacin T in pregnancy or breastfeeding .Certain medicine should not be used during pregnancy or breast feeding. Other medicine may be safely used provided benefited to the unborn baby. Always inform your doctor before using any medicine.The safety to use during pregnancy is not been recommended unless and until recommended by your doctor. It is not known that it passes into breast milk. Breastfeeding is therefore not recommended while using this medicine unless and until prescribed by the doctor
